review: Just as advertised, it was quick and easy to set up and it is small so it can fit in anywhere on your system.  Having 40K movies available to chose from is great for those days when you must be home or choose to be home.  As a satisfied Amazon Prime member, I just hope Amazon continues to expand their free collection of available titles.  Streaming is smooth and uninterrupted.
author: Frederick A. Czulada

review: Fire TV has a lot of great content.  I love the flexibility of being able to side-load apps.  The voice command works well.  Fire TV has some perks that I didn't expect...I downloaded some relaxation apps for $1 each...virtual fireplace with classical music in the background, beach scenes, etc. for when I want to relax but not watch TV.  At first I was disappointed that it did not have a 3.5mm headphone jack, as my husband likes to watch bad movies and I don't want to hear them :)  But I solved that problem by buying a "Orei DA21 Optical SPDIF/Coaxial Digital to RCA L/R Analog Audio Converter with 3.5mm Jack Support Headphone/Speaker Outputs" here on Amazon.  This allowed me to connect the Fire TV to the Orei converter and the converter to my wireless Sennheiser headphones.  Peace at last!  :)
author: Kat312 "Kat312"

review: I purchased one at a Staples store and I had problems with it shutting down.  Amazon was very helpful in troubleshooting it.  After a number of attempts to reset things the problem never went away.  It would play for a time and then just shut down and then reload. Amazon decided to send me a replacement - a new unit with next day shipping - they were great.  The new one is fantastic.  It works great with my WiFi - no problems.  Thanks Amazon. I quit Comcast TV and with a Mohu Leaf HD antenna for local channels and the Fire TV I couldn't be happier.  I now have better content and I am saving money.
